#summary Release notes for each release (enhancements, bug fixes, etc)
#labels Featured

= Release Notes =

=== 1.1 ===
  * *groupId changed to com.google.code.maven-replacer-plugin to comply with standard Maven repository which will enable this plugin to be uploaded to the main repo.*
  * Fixed Issue 16
  * Fixed Issue 13

=== 1.0.3 ===
  * Value is no longer required. If no value is supplied, the token is removed entirely.
  * Fixed inability to replace tokens spanning more than one line.

=== 1.0.2 ===
  * When using the outputFile parameter, if the base path does not exist it will be created.

=== 1.0.1 ===
  * Added optional {{{<regex>[true, false]</regex>}}} parameter. Set to true when token contains a regular expression. Set to false if you do not want regular expressions considered within a token. (If not supplied, regex will be considered by default).
  * Added optional {{{<outputFile>some file</outputFile>}}} parameter. The modified file contents are written to this file if specified. (If not supplied, replace will overwrite input file).
